Summary: Saw about 5-7 bright glowing objects seperately, then grouped together.
divs: Sighting DetailsI was working in Dix Hills, suffolk county, new york. I was in a customers back yard at 8:30 pm on 4-16-08, which I have been to before- it's on a hill with a schoolyard below. I was doing repairs on their swimming pool. I noticed in between the trees in the distance 5-7 bright lights. They were white, red, blue-green and orange. I noticed them pretty quickly because it was so dark in the yard. Looking at it quickly kind of looked like it may have been lights on a tall building- but I realized theres no buildings nearby. I watched for a few moments and the lights were on a slight angle- very bright. I continued with my work and looked again and noticed the lights were moving into a circular formation and then seperated into a straight line(resembled what I saw on t.v. about the Arizona lights). I took 2 twenty second long videos with my phone ,which shows the lights but the video at night on a cell phone camcorder doesnt really show as well as I saw with my eyes. I thought maybe it could have been planes but of all the planes in this area I have never seen that many at once in the same area and never seen planes that close group together for obvious safety reasons. After a while the lights just seemed to disappear one by one.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Dix Hills
